Method Detail

createBehaviour

public <T extends IBehaviour> IBehaviour createBehaviour(Class<T> rqdClass,
                                                         IRenderable token,
                                                         double[] posn,
                                                         double[] angle)
                           throws Exception
Create a new behaviour, add it to the managed list, and return a reference to it.

Specified by:
createBehaviour in interface IBehaviourMgr
Parameters:
rqdClass - the implementation type of IBehaviour to be instantiated
token - a reference to the token that the behaviour is for
posn - a Double[3] that gives x,y,z coords of token
angle - a Double[3] that gives orientation of token about x,y,z
Throws:
Exception

update

public void update()
Update all IBehaviours being managed, call on each pass through the update loop

Specified by:
update in interface IBehaviourMgr
